English.alert.about:
Location Triggers for Cronios lets you run shortcuts or send text messages whenever you enter a location.

Configure your location triggers to run once, every day, or every time. Unleash the power of location with Cronios and Location Triggers!
English.alert.currentLocation: Retrievijg your current location. This may take a few moments.
English.alert.import:
Tap OK to import into Cronios.

If Import Active Status is enabled in Cronios Settings, the cron job will run automatically when you enter “Tun Continuously” mode in Cronios. otherwise edit the cron job and tap Enable.

You may also want to adjust the cron schedule expression for the job to better suit the frequency of checks, which is currently set to every {{frequency}} minutes.
English.alert.lastSent: Your last text message was sent on:
English.alert.lastSent.never: You have never sent a text message using Text When I Arrive.
English.alert.location.none: No location specified. Please launch this shortcut from the Shortcuts Home to configure before running it in Cronios.
English.alert.mapsURL.clipboard: The maps URL to this location has been copied to the clipboard
English.alert.recipient.nome: No recipient specified. Please launch this shortcut from the Shortcuts Home to configure before running it in Cronios.
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval: Retrieving a list of your shortcuts. This may take a few moments.
English.alert.success.message: Your text message to “{{recipient}}” was sent.
English.error.cronios: Cronios is not installed on this iOS device. Download it from http://cronios.com.
English.error.cronios.title: Cronios Not Installed
English.error.triggerRadius.title: Trigger Radius Error
English.error.triggerRadius: Trigger Radius cannot be a negative number.
English.menu.entry.toggle.description: Monitoring will occur when Cronios is active.
English.menu.entry.repeat.daily.description: This location trigger will run once a day.
English.menu.entry.repeat.everytime.description: This will run every time Location Triggers runs.
English.menu.entry.repeat.once.description: This location trigger will disable itself on success
English.menu.main.toggle.description: All active location triggers will be monitored.
English.menu.main.toggle.description.off: No location triggers will be monitored.
English.prompt.command: Choose a command to run when you are within the location’s trigger radius.
English.prompt.delete: Delete the selected location triggers? This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.donate: Enjoing Location Triggers for Cronios? I'd appreciate a tip!
English.prompt.action: Choose an action to run when you are in the location’s trigger radius.
English.prompt.frequency: How often do you want this cron job to run in Cronios? Check times start from the top of the hour.
English.prompt.iPad: This iPad may only be able to send messages to iMessage recipients.
English.prompt.location: Enter the location where you want this trigger to occur.
English.prompt.name: Enter a name for your location trigger.
English.prompt.message: Enter the message you will send to the recipient when arriving at the location.
English.prompt.openApp: Location Triggers for Cronios must switch to Shortcuts to evaluate your location triggers.
English.prompt.recipient: Separate recipients with new lines. There is a max of 5 recipients.
English.prompt.repeat: How often should the command be run if you remain within the location’s trigger radius?
English.prompt.shortcut: Choose a shortcut to run when you are within the location’s trigger radius.
English.prompt.triggerRadius: Enter the radius in {{distance unit}} around the location where you want the trigger to occur.
English.prompt.unlock: You will need to unlock this device to retrieve the current location and continue evaluating your location triggers.
